CustomField.formula: IF(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__c != null, IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c,'Closed - Refinanced'),'Closed - Refinanced', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c,'Active - Good Standing'),'Active - Good Standing', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c,'Active - Bad Standing'),'Active - Bad Standing',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c, 'Active - Matured'), 'Active - Matured',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c,'Approved'),'Approved',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c, 'Canceled'), 'Canceled', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c, 'Closed - Obligations met'), 'Closed - Obligations met', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c, 'Closed - Premature'), 'Closed - Premature', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c, 'Closed- Written Off'), 'Closed- Written Off', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c, 'Invalid'), 'Invalid', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c, 'Partial Application'), 'Partial Application',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c, 'Pending Approval'), 'Pending Approval', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.CL_Contract__r.loan__Loan_Status__c, 'Active - Marked for Closure'), 'Active - Marked for Closure', 'Premature Closure Initiated'))))))))))))), '')
CustomField.label: Loan Status
